full_summary:
================================queued

## Government Tender Announcement
### RFP: Pneumatic and Hydraulic and Electric Control Systems

**Reference Number:** cb-5813-73059882 
**Amendment Number:** 5

The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of Pneumatic and Hydraulic and Electric Control Systems as outlined below.

### Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date:** June 23, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 23, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** June 24, 2024
* **Regions of Delivery:** CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Required Items

* **Pitch Setter**, NSN: 12-1908563, quantity 20 for each location
* Approved brands and part numbers:
	+ Fernsteuergeräte Kurt Oelsch GmbH & Co. KG (C0324)
	+ Part No.: M32G12PW620MROEM3-2S200F, M32-G12-PW620MIII/2S/200F
	+ Atlas Elektronik GmbH (C4338)
	+ Part No.: H47117635-1/1

### Submission Guidelines

* Bidders must submit their response in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* The bid should include the proposed quantity and unit of issue for each item.
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and the NCAGE (NATO Commercial and Government Entity Code) they are offering.

### Additional Information

* Documents may be submitted electronically, and a tender notice is available for download [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5813/rfp-w8482-241658-eng.pdf) (English) [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5813/rfp-w8482-241658-fre.pdf) (French).

### Contact Information

* The contracting officer may be contacted by email at [Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca) or by phone at (343) 598-6913.

**Note:**
